title: S5 adc/mid main Lft semi serious team
body:
Hey so I'm looking to ease my way back into competetive gaming after 2 years of having a much more chilled approach to esports. 
I am not the best player, not by a long shot and have a lot to learn.
I would love to have a team around me that is passionate, and can help me improve. so that, hopefully, we as a team can grow into something amazing.
Add me in game for any more details.

replies.body: VBladez what lanes do you play most? Me and a couple friends are looking for a Top and ADC if you're keen?

I am not really feeling up to a ranked team, but I would like to experiment with it.
I am in silver 5.
Main lanes are ADC and Supp I can't really play the other lanes very well.
For now my main ADCs are Graves and Miss Fortune but I just started to play Lucian.
My Main Supports are Sona, Soraka, Janna, Blitz and a few others. 
Bye {{summoner:31}}
add me ingame mate well talk
